  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>ab82e3dd-1c46-11d8-9145-ebc5a59a0b31#1#7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A harmincéves háború kora</string>
            <string language="en">The age of the Thirty Years' War</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Alter des dreißig Krieges der Jahre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'âge des trente de la guerre années</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A idade da guerra dos trinta anos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'età della guerra dei trenta anni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ηλικία του πολέμου των τριάντα ετών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La edad de la guerra de los treinta años</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Svédország, a Német Birodalom, Csehország és Lengyelország útja a 17. században</string>
            <string language="en">Sweden, The German Empire, through Czech Republic and Poland in the 17. century</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">westfáliai béke,  Gustav Adolf,  Wallenstein,  Habsburg,  </string>
            <string language="en">piece of Westfalia, Gustav Adolf, Wallenstein, Habsburg</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schweden, das deutsche Reich, durch tschechische 
Republik und Polen im Jahrhundert 17.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Suède, l'empire allemand, par la République 
Tchèque et la Pologne en siècle 17.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sweden, o império alemão, através da 
república czech e do Poland no século 17.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Svezia, l'impero tedesco, attraverso la 
Repubblica ceca e la Polonia nel secolo 17.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σουηδία, η γερμανική αυτοκρατορία, μέσω της Τσεχίας 
και της Πολωνίας στον αιώνα 17,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Suecia, el imperio alemán, a través de la 
república checa y de Polonia en el siglo 17.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stück von Westfalen, Gustav Adolf, Wallenstein, 
Habsburg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">morceau de la Westphalie, Gustav Adolf, Wallenstein, 
Habsburg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">parte de Westfalia, Gustav Adolf, Wallenstein, 
Habsburg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">parte della Vestfalia, Gustav Adolf, Wallenstein, 
Habsburg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κομμάτι της Βεστφαλίας, gustav Adolf, Wallenstein, 
Habsbourg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pedazo de Westfalia, Gustav Adolf, Wallenstein, 
Habsburg</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

        <metaMetadata>

    </metadata>
